A Social eLearning platform for your WordPress site. For corporate training and Education centers around the world.

  • Activity tracking & Spec compliance

Social

eLearning

Join our award-winning platform, and enjoy a creative, dynamic and inclusive culture focused on one goal.

Corporate Training Center.

Enable companies to manage their custom groups of students, courses and view statistics.
Companies can register themselves on this portal and show selected courses to their employees and track their performances.

Notification & Emails

Send automatic notifications, emails & messages to Instructors, Students

<style>
.stripeitems {
    text-align:center;
    padding:120px 0;margin-top:-5px !important;
    background:#f5f6f7;
}
.stripeitems strong{
    font-size:20px;text-transform:uppercase;
}
.stripeitems .one_third{
    border-right:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.05);
}
.stripeitems .one_third:last-child{border:none;}
.stripeitems .column_content{
    text-align:left;
    padding:30px;
}
.stripeitems .column_content i{font-size:64px;float:left;margin:0 15px 60px 0;}
.stripeitems .column_content h3{font-size:48px;}
.stripeitems .column_content p{font-size:16px;line-height:0.8;}
.onethree {
    font-size:16px;
    padding: 120px 0;
}.onethree h2,.twothree h2{
    font-size: 48px;
    font-weight: 200;
    letter-spacing: -1px;
    margin: 0;
}.onethree ul{
    list-style:disc inside;
}
.twothree h3,
.onethree h3 {
    font-size: 36px;
    font-weight: 800;
    letter-spacing: -1px;
    margin: -20px 0 30px;
    text-transform: unset;
}
.twothree{
    background: #5b11b8;
    color: #fff;
    display:inline-block;
    width:100%;
    margin: 120px 120px 0 0; padding: 30px 0px 30px 120px;
    clip-path: polygon(0 0,100% 0%,100% 100%,120px 100%);-webkit-clip-path: polygon(0 0,100% 0%,100% 100%,120px 100%);
}
.twothree .column_content p {
    font-size: 16px;
}.twothree h2,.twothree h3{color:#fff;}
.twothree img{    position: absolute;bottom: 0;right: -60px;width: 80%;z-index: 99;}
.punchline{padding:90px 0 45px;font-size:16px;}.punchline h2{font-size:4rem;}
.serviceblockhome{margin:0px 0 60px 0 ;}.serviceblockhome h4{margin-top:25px;}
.serviceblockhome img{border-radius:6px;}
.plaxslider{margin-bottom:90px !important;}
.contactblock {
    display: inline-block;
    width: 100%;
    text-align: center;
}.contactblock input[type="submit"]{
    display:block;
    width:100%;
    text-align:center !important;
}
.headingblock {
    padding:30px 30px 30px 0;
    margin-right:30px;
    border-right:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.05);
}
.headingblock h3{
    font-weight:800;
}
.newsblock .date{display:none;}.newsblock .vibe_carousel .flex-control-nav li a{transition all 0.5s;background: rgba(0,0,0,0.2); width: 5px; height: 5px;;width:5px;height:5px;}.newsblock .vibe_carousel .flex-control-nav li a.flex-active{height:10px;background:#5b11b8;}
.newsblock .block h4.block_title {margin: 30px 0 10px;}.newsblock .block_title a{color:#5b11b8;}
.popularheadline{margin:60px 0;}
#icon8731{font-size:;background:;padding:;border-radius:;color:#5b11b8;}
            #icon8731:hover{color:;background:;}
#icon3938{font-size:;background:;padding:;border-radius:;color:#5b11b8;}
            #icon3938:hover{color:;background:;}
#icon6508{font-size:;background:;padding:;border-radius:;color:#5b11b8;}
            #icon6508:hover{color:;background:;}
</style>
